short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Warns before visiting Washington Post, LA Times, or USA Today.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Some people are avoiding certain newspapers because of the anxiety news can cause. This extension gives a warning prior to showing that content.
